hazards.name: Thin Ice
hazards.description: A fragile ice sheet that may crack under weight.

hazards.name: Extreme Cold
hazards.description: Sustained exposure can weaken creatures without proper protection.

hazards.name: Blizzard
hazards.description: Driving snow and wind obscures vision and chills to the bone.

hazards.name: Ice Slick
hazards.description: A patch of slippery ice that can cause falls.

hazards.name: Quicksand
hazards.description: Treacherous ground that pulls creatures down.

hazards.name: Riptide
hazards.description: A strong underwater current that pulls creatures away.

hazards.name: Slippery Rocks
hazards.description: Wet, algae-covered rocks that are treacherous to cross.

hazards.name: Crashing Wave
hazards.description: Periodic waves that can knock creatures off their feet.

hazards.name: Heat Exhaustion
hazards.description: Extreme heat that saps strength and endurance.

hazards.name: Sandstorm
hazards.description: Blinding sand that obscures vision and stings exposed skin.

hazards.name: Sinkhole
hazards.description: Unstable ground that may collapse.

hazards.name: Pit Trap
hazards.description: A concealed pit with sharpened stakes.

hazards.name: Snare
hazards.description: A hidden rope trap that entangles creatures.

hazards.name: Poison Ivy
hazards.description: Irritating plants that cause rashes and discomfort.

hazards.name: Falling Branch
hazards.description: Dead branches that may fall on passersby.

hazards.name: Hidden Pit
hazards.description: A concealed hole in the ground.

hazards.name: Snake Nest
hazards.description: A nest of venomous snakes.

hazards.name: Prairie Fire
hazards.description: Spreading flames through dry grass.

hazards.name: Rockslide
hazards.description: Loose rocks that tumble down slopes.

hazards.name: Unstable Ground
hazards.description: Loose earth that shifts underfoot.

hazards.name: Cliff Edge
hazards.description: A dangerous precipice.

hazards.name: Avalanche
hazards.description: A wall of snow and ice rushing down the mountain.

hazards.name: Falling Rocks
hazards.description: Loose stones that tumble from above.

hazards.name: Crevasse
hazards.description: A deep crack in ice or rock.

hazards.name: Thin Air
hazards.description: High altitude with reduced oxygen.

hazards.name: Poison Gas
hazards.description: Noxious fumes that fill the area.

hazards.name: Diseased Water
hazards.description: Stagnant water filled with pathogens.

hazards.name: Hidden Sinkhole
hazards.description: Ground that suddenly gives way.

hazards.name: Cave-In
hazards.description: Collapsing ceiling in an unstable cavern.

hazards.name: Poison Spores
hazards.description: Toxic fungal spores that fill the air.

hazards.name: Acid Pool
hazards.description: A pool of corrosive liquid.

hazards.name: Web Trap
hazards.description: Sticky spider webs that entangle creatures.

hazards.name: Strong Current
hazards.description: A powerful underwater current.

hazards.name: Pressure Zone
hazards.description: Extreme water pressure at depth.

hazards.name: Electric Eel
hazards.description: An electric eel lurking in the water.

hazards.name: Whirlpool
hazards.description: A swirling vortex that pulls creatures under.

hazards.name: Falling Debris
hazards.description: Rubble falling from damaged structures.

hazards.name: Fire
hazards.description: Flames spreading through the area.

hazards.name: Trap Door
hazards.description: A concealed door that drops creatures below.

hazards.name: Collapsing Floor
hazards.description: Weakened flooring that may give way.

hazards.name: Dart Trap
hazards.description: Pressure plates that trigger poisoned darts.

hazards.name: Collapsing Ceiling
hazards.description: An unstable ceiling that may fall.
